recommendation_reason: The highest scoring issue (#8930) shares the same assertion message but has a different root cause (sqrt/floor operations vs string port type). Issue #8332 discusses StringType support but focuses on lowering to LLVM dialect. No existing issue specifically addresses DynamicStringType causing dyn_cast failure in ModulePortInfo::sanitizeInOut() when used as a module port type.
